item.title: Humanities vs. Sciences
item.author: Author
item.description: The internal conflict I know for certain that I’m going to get a masters degree. I’m not sure what fuels this confidence, whether it be the over achiever that I’m trying to calm down, or some seemingly higher sentiment like “love of learning”. Either way, at some point I will go back to Uni. Putting aside the inherent motive, the remaining question is what should I take up as a major.

item.title: My First Post - Edited in vim
item.author: Author
item.description: First Post Intro As the first post, I will try to explain to myself the reason for opening this blog. The most important one I guess - to write things. Practice my written expression capabilities. After years of journaling, I understand that knowing that what you write is publib makes a difference on the outcome. The main topics I’d like to tackle here are: Tech Books Personal insights and questions
